Class Task

java.lang.Object
application.Task
public class Task extends Object
Represents a task in the Quirx task management system. Each task has a description, owner, status, due date, priority level, and a completion flag (used with a checkbox in the UI).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Task.Priority
    Represents the priority of a task, with a display name and associated CSS style class.
    static enum 
    Task.Status
    Represents the status of a task, with a display name and associated CSS style class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(String task, String owner, Task.Status status, String dueDate, Task.Priority priority)
      Constructs a Task with specified values.
      Parameters:
      task - the description of the task
      owner - the person responsible for the task
      status - the current status of the task
      dueDate - the due date of the task
      priority - the priority level of the task
